prompts: Create a playful water-type Pokemon that has a rounded body and a smiling face.
Show me a cute Psychic Pokemon with a bubbly personality and oversized ears.
Imagine a small blue Pokemon with a happy expression and a curled tail.
Generate a whimsical creature that evolves into a more powerful form with a large head.
Make a cheerful Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas and loves to play.
Design a tiny Pokemon that has a unique tail and an endearing giggle.
Give me an adorable creature with large eyes and a friendly demeanor, perfect for training.
